line_1: Join'd with a double Share of Ignorance;
line_2: A little Learning; twenty Grains of Sense,

line_1: Above the scorn of sordid Ignorance,
line_2: Who? now the Muses lustre shall advance

line_1: No other plea but that of IGNORANCE.
line_2: Who, thus call'd forth to answer, can advance
That dream't of THULE, yet afraid t'advance;

line_1: Oh, Psyche, happy in thine ignorance!
line_2: Be but content, nor daringly advance
